unittitle_ssm: Carl H. Dahlstrom collection of Blizzard of 1888 photographs
abstract_ssm: Photographs in the collection are modern copy prints of black-and-white negatives taken by a Dr. Levison following the blizzard. Images are located in the Boerum Hill and Downtown neighborhoods of Brooklyn.
